feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.51.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] fix test by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4156
  • [misc] add forum post and update sign pipeline by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4155
  • [management] fix index creation if exist on mysql by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4150
  • [management] Add validate flow response by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4172
  • [client, relay] The openConn function no longer blocks the relayAddress function call by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4180
  • [client] Add --filter-by-connection-type flag to status command by @aliamerj in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4010
  • [client] Fix bind exclusion routes by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4154
  • [management] Fix group resource count mismatch in policy by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4182
  • [server, relay] Fix/relay race disconnection by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4174

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.51.1...v0.51.2

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.52.0
entry.content:
This release adds the profile feature, please refer to the documentation

What's Changed

  • [misc] Docker compose improvements by @Silex in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4037
  • [client] Fix race issues in lazy tests by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4181
  • [client] Temporarily disable race detection in Relay by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4210
  • [client] Fix legacy routing exclusion routes in kernel mode by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4167
  • [client] Add env and status flags for netbird service command by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3975
  • [management] extra settings integrated validator by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4136
  • [management] scheduler cancel all jobs by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4158
  • [management] Log UpdateAccountPeers caller by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4216
  • [client] Remove custom method from generated proto and use inline logic for connection type filtering by @aliamerj in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4214
  • [management] Log BufferUpdateAccountPeers caller by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4217
  • [client] handle order of check when checking order of files in isChecksEqual by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4219
  • [client] make ICE failed timeout configurable by @gamerslouis in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4211
  • [client] client: container: support CLI with entrypoint addition by @nazarewk in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4126
  • [client] Always register NetBird with plain Linux DNS and use original servers as upstream by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3967
  • [client] Fix UDP proxy to notify listener when remote conn closed by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4199
  • [client] Remove and deprecate the admin url functionality by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4218
  • [client] Add detailed routes and resolved IPs to debug bundle by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4141
  • [client] Feat/multiple profile by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3980
  • [client] remove config flag by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4224
  • [client] Fix pre-shared key state in wg show by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4222
  • [client] Fix config directory path handling based on NB_STATE_DIR by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4229
  • [client] Add support for disabling profiles feature via command line flag by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4235

New Contributors

  • @gamerslouis made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4211

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.51.2...v0.52.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.52.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Disable the dns host manager properly if disabled through management by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4241
  • [client] Fix error handling for set config request on CLI by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4237

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.52.0...v0.52.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.52.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [misc] Dockerfile: pin gopls to v0.18.1 (latest that supports golang 1.23) by @Bilgeworth in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4240
  • [management] add account deleted event by @crn4 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4255
  • [client] Fix dns ipv6 upstream by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4257

New Contributors

  • @Bilgeworth made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4240

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.52.1...v0.52.2

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.53.0
entry.content:
Release Notes for v0.53.0

What's New

Control plane licensing changes

  • Changed the license of management, relay, and signal components to AGPLv3. #4285

    Learn more at https://netbird.io/knowledge-hub/netbird-agpl-announcement

Client Enhancements

  • Improved userspace filter logging performance. #4221
  • Added logout feature for improved session management. #4268
  • Increased IP rule priorities to avoid routing conflicts. #4273
  • Added config flag to override default profile path in the client service. #4276
  • Included full sync response in the debug bundle for troubleshooting. #4287

Management Improvements

  • Migrated group peers into a separate table for better performance and structure. #4096
  • Implemented network range change API. #4177
  • Optimized peer group retrieval by removing unnecessary locks. #4280
  • Implemented peer expiration for invalid peers. #4275

Other Changes

  • Moved shared components to a centralized shared directory. #4286
  • Separated shared code dependencies for better modularity. #4288

Full Changelog: v0.52.2...v0.53.0
